title: Shop getting a Reset ?
body:
Hello,So i saw the shop is up yesterday and i opened it, Luckily i got the Skin i was dying for " Championship Zed"   ,, I went to sleep. Woke up. Bought RP and went with a big smile to buy my skin. Then i realized the shop was down.i was oki with it but then i saw some forums and people comments they said that the shop will get a reset. if this is real it would be so Damn unfair...  thoughts ?!

i would add a POLL but i know most people would want this reset...

replies.body: Send in a ticket to riot support they honor the first deals they sent out.

This wasn't a matter of us pushing through a reset, but the shop had some bugs that needed to be fixed. Regardless of what we did to fix it, when the shop came back up it was going to have been reset. If you have any concerns with the new offers, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
